text: Very Good place to eat! Whatever your in the mood for, they got it, and Quite Delicious I might add! The prices are inexpensive, the waitress girl was courteous and Pleasant. text: It's good food, it really is and the service is great! The only real problem and it's no fault of the establishment other than the fact that the food and service is amazing is that this place stays packed. Expect a full house every visit. I suggest going later in the evening around 6 or so to possibly avoid huge crowds.

text: Pizza is good . You had better grab it from the buffet fast though because it doesnt last long when there is alot of people . It is like wrestling hyenas at the buffet for some food.

text: I love this place. Just can't move when I leave. Eat way to much. Always get my moneys worth.

text: Great buffet. My family loves it. I have Celiac so it‚Äôd be nice to have some gluten-free crust pizza options on the buffet. The bathrooms are kind of dirty and they‚Äôre definitely too small. I think it‚Äôs time for Pizza Inn to get some remodeling done.

text:
We've always loved pizza inn, ever since i was a kid back in the '80s. Their piazza is some of the best around.
This trip, just got some tea to go,  you can get a half or whole gallon of sweet or unsweet tea, and, if you ask, sometimes can even get decaf tea.
Highly recommend.

text: Food was good. But no food on buffet and took a long time to replenish.  Very friendly staff and seems pretty clean. Recommend going.

Not an expensive place and worth the time to visit.
